specific_issues.description: Discussed vehicle recall considerations with Members of Congress and their staffs; discussed need for independent auto care industries to have access to data generated by embedded vehicle telematics systems; formed Congressional Auto Care Caucus; monitored Federal Vehicle Repair Cost Savings Act of 2015 (H.R. 1613/S. 565), Motor Vehicle Safety Whistleblower Act (S. 304), and Security and Privacy in Your Car Act of 2015 (S. 1806). Supported passage of Promoting Automotive Repair, Trade, and Sales Act of 2015 or the PARTS Act (H.R. 1057) and long-term extension of transportation funding.

ali_info.federal_agencies: U.S. HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES, U.S. SENATE, Natl Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA), Federal Highway Administration (FHA), Transportation - Dept of (DOT)

specific_issues.description: Opposed significant new rules for 1-propane, 2, 3, 4-terra fluro; opposed passage of Safe Chemicals Act; supported TSCA Modernization Act of 2015 (H.R. 2567) and Frank R. Lautenberg Toxic Substances Reform Act (S. 697); discussed possible EPA regulations on TCE; applied for small entity representative status re: TCE issue; discussed chemical and workplace labeling updates; worked with SBA and OSHA on refrigerant requirements and workplace safety regulatory changes; consulted EPA and SBA on truck glider kit greenhouse gas emissions rule

ali_info.federal_agencies: U.S. SENATE, U.S. HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES, Environmental Protection Agency (EPA), Occupational Safety & Health Administration (OSHA), Small Business Administration (SBA)

specific_issues.description: Supported passages of legislation that'd revise patent law to ensure availability of competitive aftermarket cosmetic parts (H.R. 1057, S. 560); supported development of legislation to strengthen IRP enforcement measures against online infringement; interested in Combating Infringement and Counterfeits Act and Dept. of Justice's anti-counterfeiting initiatives.

ali_info.federal_agencies: U.S. SENATE, U.S. HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES

specific_issues.description: Supported letter to FTC from Congress re: proper enforcement of Magnusson-Moss Warranty Act.

ali_info.federal_agencies: U.S. SENATE, U.S. HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES, Federal Trade Commission (FTC)

specific_issues.description: Supported Extension of SPA loan program stimulus provisions in the ARRA through the end of 2010 (HR 5297); opposed Tester-Corker amendment to postpone the implementation of swipe fee reform in Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act.

Supported the American Jobs Protection Act (H.R. 903/S. 399) and other efforts to eliminate employee mandate. Supported HR Jobs and Premium Act (H.R. 763/S. 603); supported H.R. 3367 to delay the Health Insurance Tax in the Affordable Care Act. Supported Protecting Affordable Coverage for Employees Act (H.R. 1624 / S. 1099) to repeal small group expansion requirement and the Forty Hours is Full Time Act of 2015 (S. 30) to change the full-time definition from 30 hours to 40 hours under the Affordable Care Act by amending the Internal Revenue Code; supported Commonsense Reporting and Verification Act (H.R. 2712 / S. 1996); supported Small Business Healthcare Relief Act (H.R. 2911 / S. 1697.

ali_info.federal_agencies: U.S. SENATE, U.S. HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES

specific_issues.description: Supported HR 1120: Preventing Greater Uncertainty in Labor-management Relations Act; opposed National Labor Regulations Board Actions to compress time for employee decisions regarding unionization; supported HR 2346, the Secret Ballot Protection Act; supported Protecting Local Business Opportunity Act (H.R. 3459 / S. 2015)

ali_info.federal_agencies: U.S. SENATE, U.S. HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES

specific_issues.description: Interested in US Dept of Commerce's Sustainable Initiative and additional study called Regarding Remanufacturing; supported aftermarket inclusion in automotive industry manufacturing hearings.

ali_info.federal_agencies: U.S. SENATE, U.S. HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES

specific_issues.description: Supported the Motor Vehicle Owners' Right to Repair Act; participated in SBA roundtables on environmental issues and labor issues.

ali_info.federal_agencies: U.S. SENATE, U.S. HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES, Occupational Safety & Health Administration (OSHA), Small Business Adminstration (SBA)

specific_issues.description: Opposed efforts to eliminated use of LIFO accounting method as part of budget debate; discussed and considered position on e-Fairness, The Marketplace Fairness Act (S. 698); supported repeal of Estate Tax (H.R. 1105); lobbied for Fair Effective tax rates; discussed tax repatriation options for transportation funding; supported Health Insurance Tax repeal (H.R. 928 / S. 183).

ali_info.federal_agencies: U.S. SENATE, U.S. HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES

specific_issues.description: Interested in WTO disputes related to the auto industry; interested in free trade agreement negotiations and impact on the auto industry; interested in Customs-related legislation and regulations; interested in intellectual property and anti-counterfeiting initiatives impact the auto industry; interested in domestic and international tariff and non-tarriff barriers affecting auto products.

ali_info.federal_agencies: U.S. SENATE, U.S. HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES, Intl Trade Administration (ITA), U.S. Trade Representative (USTR), Commerce - Dept of (DOC), U.S. International Trade Commission (ITC)

specific_issues.description: Request for nat'l certification standard for aftermarket catalytic converters; opposed provisions of draft "Super Pollutants Acts of 2014" that would restrict sale of automotive refrigerants to consumers; Monitored Phase II medium and heavy duty vehicle emissions regulations and proposed glider kit limitations.

ali_info.federal_agencies: U.S. SENATE, U.S. HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES, Environmental Protection Agency (EPA)

specific_issues.description: Encouraged inclusion of aftermarket technology and research in ITS initiatives across DOT; discussed future national transportation bill and possible transportation funding efforts; discussed concerns truckers hours of service and CSA program.

ali_info.federal_agencies: U.S. SENATE, U.S. HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES, Transportation - Dept of (DOT), Natl Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA), Federal Highway Administration (FHA), Federal Motor Carrier Safety Administration
